NGUYEN THI HOA VAN 
Product Manager 
                         0966.972.717                     * hoavanmoi@gmail.com               * Hung Vuong  2, District 7, HCMC  
PERSONAL PROFILE 
Gender 
: Female 
Birthday 
: 27/05/1983 
Marital status 
: Married 
OBJECTIVES 
I am looking for a dynamic & professional environment where offers me the opportunity to explore new skills & 
knowledge areas while further sharpening those I already possess. My key strengths include adaptability, diligence and 
the determination to get a task completed as proven by various work experiences in product management, 
communication, marketing activities. I always seek out new responsibilities irrespective of reward and recognition. 
EXPERIENCE 
Year(s) of Experience: 9 
3/2019 - Now: Product Manager - Grassroots Aesthetic Pharma - HCMC 
Responsibilities: 
• Managed all cosmetics and medical equipment brands (Teoxane, Stratamed, Strataderm, Stratamark, Envy 
Medical and Skingen International). 
• Managed the approved promotion budget to achieve profit targets. 
• Developed 2019 marketing plan for the products following SMART standards. 
• Developed a training system for Sales Team and customers. 
• Established point-of-sale displays and managed allocated budgets. 
• Managed inventory, orders and sales report. 
• Prepared annual, monthly sales forecast and spending of the assigned brands. 
Achievements: 
• Completed the marketing plan for Q3 and Q4 2019 to increase 15% each month. 
• Increased sales in the third quarter of 2019 to 46% over the same period in 2018. 
• Successfully launched Teoxane cosmetics products and managed medical equipment brands. 
• Recommended product name and price adjustments due to internal and external factors. 
• Successfully built the shelf display program at the 40 biggest medical clinics. 
• Successfully organized Teoxane workshops: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l1qHxlzMn_Y 
• Expanded the product distribution system on Lazada, Tiki, Leflair, Con Cung, Long Chau, Phano and pharmacy 
stores. 
• Developed KOLs and built professional relationship with key stakeholders. 
7/2018 - 3/2019: Marketing Manager - Sorbus Vietnam Company Limited - HCMC 
Responsibilities: 
• Managed Solgar, an American premium vitamin brand. 
• Be responsible for the marketing activities. 
• Developed ecommerce channels. 
• Ensured achievement of sales and budget objectives.  
Achievements: 
• Achieved triple sales after 3 months by optimizing digital advertising campaigns. 
• Successfully managed Solgar online shops on Lazada, Tiki, Adayroi, Lotte, Sendo, Vnexpress shop, Shopee... and 
increased 20% each month. 
• Successfully targeted high-end customers to make the most effective marketing plans. 
• Led Solgar to become the most premium supplement food in Vietnam. 
• Actively negotiated to sign contracts with eight companies and corporations, expanding Solgar's distribution network. 
10/2017 - 6/2018: Marketing Communications Executive - Nhat Nhat Pharmaceutical Company Limited - Hanoi 
Responsibilities: 
• Be product manager of 2 potential products: Amanda and To Nu Nhat Nhat. 
• In charged of internal and external communication. 
• Assisted in company websites, key product websites. 
Achievements: 
• Managed to increase the sales of To Nu Nhat Nhat and Amanda in double-digit after 6 months. 
• Effectively developed presentations for products and demo scripts for use by the sales and customers. 
• Established good partnerships with gynaecologist at hospitals. 
• Developed good contents for the assigned websites with 34 articles, planned successfully online marketing 
content. 
• Conducted successfully market survey for Tonka, a strategic product of the firm, to help marketing manager to 
develop effective marketing plan for this key product. 
• Successfully partnered with different business units (Marketing, Sales, Legal Functions and Finance) for on-going 
projects, budget phasing and media plan tracking. 
10/2010 - 10/2017: Public Relations Manager - Vietnam Plant Oil and Food Processing Co., Ltd (VNPOFOOD) - 
Hanoi 
Responsibilities: 
• Managed Vinaga Gac oil capsule product and led all marketing and PR activities. 
• Planed and budgeted public relations programs. 
• Managed content produced for website and social media channels, speeches, events... 
Achievements: 
• Successfully managed integrated marketing plan to extend core communication strategies including advertising, 
online, in-store, PR and consumer activation platforms. 
• Led the brand to become 1st Gac oil capsule brand in the world. 
• Built long-term relationships with all relevant stakeholders. 
• Successfully managed “Mother's lie” viral project: https://www.youtube.com/watch? v=JzvuQIus6hA. 
• Successfully launched Vinaga-DHA in April 2016. Achieved Best Manager Award in 2014. 
EDUCATION 
Highest Degree Level: Postgraduate 
Completion date 8-2012 | Business Management 
Certificate - Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ), in Germany 
Completion date 8-2009 | Agronomy 
Postgraduate - National University of Agriculture, in Hanoi 
SKILLS 
Business mindset, Problem solving    
Analysis and organization skill 
Communication skill, Leadership 
Teamwork, Time management 
 LANGUAGES 
  English 
REFERENCES 
Nguyễn Công Suất | Director | Vietnam Plant Oil and Food Processing Co., Ltd  
0913203536 / gm@vnpofood.com 
Cấn Khúc Nghiên | Marketing Manager | Nhat Nhat Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd 
0906689578 / nghien.can.mkt@nhatnhatgroup.com
